participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Creative, thoughtful, and a bit introverted. Enjoys expressing herself through art.
participant_1.background: I finished drawing the latest issue of my comic book series. I'm going to a local Christmas concert with my friend, even though I can't sing very well. I worry about my pets. I have a pet dog. I'm going to take a cold shower, then do some gardening.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Inquisitive and introspective, with a sense of humor. Seeks fulfillment beyond his day job.
participant_2.background: My family tries to convince me to dump my fiancé. I am a traveling encyclopedia salesman. I enjoy this type of activist work, as my job is not very personally fulfilling. My parents were scientists. I read a poem or two to get my creative juices flowing before starting my day.

content.text: Hi, I'm doing well! I'm going to a local Christmas concert with my friend, even though I can't sing very well. How are you?
Hi! I'm doing good. I'm a traveling encyclopedia salesman. It's not a very personally fulfilling job, but I enjoy the activist work I do outside of work.
That's cool! I do some activist work too. I'm a comic book artist and I draw my own series. I finished the latest issue today.
That's awesome! I love comic books. I read a poem or two every morning to get my creative juices flowing before starting my day.
Nice! What kind of poems do you read?
I read all kinds of poems, but I really like reading works by poets from the Romantic period. I love the way they use language to paint a picture.
I've never read any Romantic poems, but I'll have to check them out. I'm more of a fan of science fiction and fantasy.
Oh, that's cool! I like sci-fi and fantasy too. I love the way they can transport you to another world.
Me too! I love getting lost in a good book.
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
